name: MeowTap
description:
Small relax clicker game with little bubble cats. 

This is a small project for testing my own Zenject services. I wanted to make the game as cute as possible with the possibility of its constant expansion.

Version 0.1 - realize services for options, interface and and audio. Make simple gameplay core.

In plans:

Version 0.2 - backgrouns, factory for bubble cats and many interactive animations

Version 0.3 - special (not random) bubble kitties, kitty collections, save service (json)
